title: New: Twin Caverns – Drown
body:
Australia’s **Twin Caverns** return with their third original offering, _Drown_, another gorgeously composed piece of electronic pop.

Whilst debut tracks, Undiscover and Swell, helped them make a mark on blogs around the world, Drown feels like a considerable step up, in both songwriting and production values. Part Purity Ring, part Grimes, whilst maintaining The XX-esque guitar line that characterised their earlier releases. Check out _Drown_ below.
